怴字的基本解释

狂。

怴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xù］
［《廣韻》許聿切，入術，曉。］
颠狂。

怴字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怴； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页382第24
【集韻】許月切，音䬂。【字林】戇貌。一曰怒貌。◎按此字與㤜字相似，㤜字从心从戍，有休必，翾劣二切。此字从心从戉，止有許月一切，集韻分別甚明。近時字書混載，舉此棄彼，《正字通》遂謂一字兼有二義，?無兩字，亦屬臆斷也。

怴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
怴字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怴; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 382 24
【Jiyun】Xu Yueqie, the sound is Qi. [Word Lin] ugly appearance. One said angry appearance. ◎Pressing this word is similar to the word 㤜, the word 㤜 is from the heart to the guard, there must be a break, and the bad is both inferior. This word is from the heart to the humiliation, only Xu Yue has everything, and the rhyme is very clear. In the recent times, the writings were mixed, and the "Zhengzitong" then said that the word has two meanings, and there is no two words, which is also a conjecture.
